issue.title: [Python] Add clarifications to Python "append" methods that return new objects
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5309](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5309). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current docstrings do say that an object is returned but it is not clear in all cases that it is a new object and the original object is left unmodified

see example thread

https://github.com/apache/arrow/issues/4296

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5309?focusedCommentId=16866814) by Francois Saint-Jacques (fsaintjacques):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4599
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4599>
